tags: Wait time,
review: Actually, I'm not happy with anything that you have mentioned in the above, you may have trained staffs over your clinic,but as a patient what I need is to talk to doctor because I'm already in trauma of extraction of teeth, and the nursing staffs over there is not giving me a satisfying reply, I myself needed to ask what is the problem and all, they just look into my mouth for 2,3 seconds and just said that you need to remove as soon as possible, see this is not the right way of conveying to a patient like me. and I keep on asking questions like is there any other way then removing, or is that safe and how can you confirm that I have infectious tooth and also I'm in pain she didn't even consider it as a matter and asking me for the consultation fee which is a large amount for telling the solution which I already know. So please add nothing in the above list.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
A word of appreciation 

I am extremely delighted to give my feedback on my visit to Dr. Mitran's dental clinic as a patient ailing with severe toothache, on 21st June 2022. As I was severely suffering from toothache I could not speak and hence I noted down all my points in a paper and gave it to a team of doctors. I was surprised to see so many doctors in a clinic. They read the paper very patiently and discussed with me under the able stewardship of Dr. Sankar Ram Mithran M. D. S. Then they decided that extraction of tooth is the only way to stop my ache. So they consulted me under the captaincy of Dr. Mithran and when I said ok, one doctor took the job of extracting my tooth. She did it so excellently well, that I didn't feel any pain during the extraction. After half an hour, they discharged me with certain important instructions. To cap those all the doctor who extracted my tooth, on the 3rd day enquired me about my well-being our phone. This follow-up work, no other clinic is doing. It is the patient who has to visit the clinic or hospital for a review meeting. I wish Dr.Mithran, M. D. S. and his team well.

S. Natarajan, 
M. A, B. Sc, M. Ed
Rtd Headmaster .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Explained the treatment
And good doctors and Team
I wish him all success in growth of hospital.
All the very best üíêüôèüéâ

review: Till now I was thinking RCT will be more painful and therefore I used to go for extraction of teeth. After undergoing RCT here, what I was thinking is not correct. RCT is less painful compared to extraction of teeth. Unnecessarily I have already removed many of my teeth though doctors suggested RCT. Doctor is friendly here and clearly explains the dental problem and leave it to the patient to think and decide. In this hospital, since appointment is strictly followed, there is no waiting time.

review: It's nice to have treated from Mithran Dental clinic. Dr was good in explaining problem faced and very clear on treatment with specialist for the given task. Waiting period was nil and took hardly 10 minutes for tooth extraction without any pain felt.

tags: Value for money,
review: I will come to remove my teeth.  He will check and tell me another doctor will come and remove the teeth.but he cont tell the full payment of money jut pay 500rs advance. Then i will advance 500rs .then he will and tell me sir r u ready to come doctor is on the way and that time also i will ask im how much rs iwill pay he will tell me u come 2to hospital doctor will tell u the Payment-  but he cant tell anything than he finish here work and ask me amount balance 2000rs so total amount 2500rs so this a worrest  method for customer. Main thing is he cant remove the stitches also there  is no calls also.
reply_text: Sir, I'm sorry you aren't satisfied with our treatment. An experienced surgeon is required to perform such a difficult tooth removal since its an impacted wisdom tooth. Due to covid pandemic the consultation need to be booked in advance. The actual cost of treatment is 3500 Rs but we reduced 1000 Rs because you were referred by owner of our building. We explained the charges beforehand but you were behaving very rudely. By the way you still haven't paid the balance amount yet and haven't picked up our calls. But don't worry we still care about patients and not money. Please pick up the phone and come for removal of stitches, we won't ask the balance payment. Thank you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Not for ordinary patients, only for elite patients..Doctor Mithran is repeating same story to every patients.
reply_text:
Could you please elaborate why our clinic is not for ordinary people? The cost of wisdom tooth removal is only 3500 rupees.. that includes consultant charges, digital x-ray, follow up, stitches removal and all post procedure care. 
Elite clinic that I know of charges upto 15000.. 
It will also be helpful if you let us know the "story" that I'm repeating to all patient.
we welcome any feedback that could help us improve but your feedback isn't helping us and it is a little vague.
Thanks.üòä
